metadata.title: CVE-2024-0131 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU kernel driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerabilitywhere a potential user-mode attacker could read Â a buffer with an incorrectlength. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
